TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LogicalMethodInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents the attributes and metadata for an XML Web service method.

span.span: Represents the attributes and metadata for an XML Web service method.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要由使用 SOAP 延伸模組來詢問與 SOAP 延伸模組設定為執行 XML Web 服務方法的詳細資料。 is used primarily by a SOAP extension to interrogate the details of the XML Web service method with which the SOAP extension is configured to run. 根據 SOAP 延伸模組的設定方式，它可以了解詳細資料中的 XML Web 服務方法方法採用。Depending on how the SOAP extension is configured, it can find out details about the XML Web service method in the method of that takes a . 提供詳細資料，例如 XML Web 服務方法的參數，藉由存取屬性和任何自訂屬性套用至 XML Web 服務方法使用屬性。The provides details such as the XML Web service method's parameters by accessing the property and any custom attributes applied to the XML Web service method using the property. 如需 SOAP 延伸模組的詳細資訊，請參閱類別或[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97d81ace-95e7-4acc-ae39-9692a0021e95)。For more details on SOAP extensions see the class or [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97d81ace-95e7-4acc-ae39-9692a0021e95).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AsyncCallbackParameter As ParameterInfo
public: property System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ AsyncCallbackParameter { System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the parameter information for the parameter of a Begin method in an asynchronous invocation.

span.span: Gets the parameter information for the parameter of a Begin method in an asynchronous invocation.

value.span: A代表參數非同步方法引動過程。

span.span: A representing the parameter of a asynchronous method invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Common language runtime 中的非同步設計模式包括呼叫`Begin`方法啟動的非同步方法引動過程和`End`方法來完成引動過程。The asynchronous design pattern in the common language runtime involves calling a `Begin` method to start the asynchronous method invocation and an `End` method to complete the invocation. `Begin`方法會採用兩個額外的參數，除了同步版本的方法所定義的參數： 一個用來儲存委派，其中儲存要傳遞給委派的任何狀態資訊。The `Begin` method takes two additional parameters besides the parameters defined by the synchronous version of the method: one to store a delegate and one to store any state information that needs to be passed on to the delegate. 這個屬性是指委派的參數名稱的參數`AsyncCallback`。This property represents the parameter for the delegate with a parameter name of `AsyncCallback`. 如需有關如何以非同步方式叫用 XML Web 服務的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0)。For more information on invoking XML Web services asynchronously, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CS/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/VB/logicalmethodinfo_create2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AsyncResultParameter As ParameterInfo
public: property System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ AsyncResultParameter { System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the return value of a asynchronous method invocation.

span.span: Gets the return value of a asynchronous method invocation.

value.span: A代表從傳回非同步方法引動過程。

span.span: A representing the returned from a asynchronous method invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Common language runtime 中的非同步設計模式包括呼叫`Begin`方法啟動的非同步方法引動過程和`End`方法來完成引動過程。The asynchronous design pattern in the common language runtime involves calling a `Begin` method to start the asynchronous method invocation and an `End` method to complete the invocation. `Begin`方法通常會立即傳回並實作介面，然後傳遞至`End`於稍後完成的非同步方法引動過程的方法。The `Begin` method typically returns immediately with an object implementing the interface, which can then be passed to the `End` method at a later time to complete the asynchronous method invocation. 傳回的物件實作介面由這個屬性。The returned object implementing the interface is represented by this property. 如需有關如何以非同步方式叫用 XML Web 服務的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0)。For more information on invoking XML Web services asynchronously, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CS/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/VB/logicalmethodinfo_create2.vb#1)]

span.span: A representing the parameter of a method in an asynchronous invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Common language runtime 中的非同步設計模式包括呼叫`Begin`方法啟動的非同步方法引動過程和`End`方法來完成引動過程。The asynchronous design pattern in the common language runtime involves calling a `Begin` method to start the asynchronous method invocation and an `End` method to complete the invocation. `Begin`方法會採用兩個額外的參數，除了同步版本的方法所定義的參數： 一個用來儲存委派，其中儲存要傳遞給委派的任何狀態資訊。The `Begin` method takes two additional parameters besides the parameters defined by the synchronous version of the method: one to store a delegate and one to store any state information that needs to be passed on to the delegate. 這個屬性代表所要傳遞至委派所需的狀態資訊。This property represents the state information that needs to be passed into the delegate. 如需有關如何以非同步方式叫用 XML Web 服務的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0)。For more information on invoking XML Web services asynchronously, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CS/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/VB/logicalmethodinfo_create2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性擷取參考宣告這個成員的類型。The property retrieves a reference to a for the type that declares this member. 類別 （或介面） 的成員宣告或繼承自基底類別 （或介面）。A member of a class (or interface) is either declared or inherited from a base class (or interface). 傳回可能無法與相同實作 XML Web 服務之類別 (如果該類別衍生自基底類別，而該基底類別中宣告這個類別所表示的方法則傳回基底類別）。The returned might not be the same as the of the class implementing the XML Web service (if that class derives from a base class and the method represented by this class is declared in that base class then the returned is the base class). ## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_constructor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor/CS/logicalmethodinfo_constructor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Constructor/VB/logicalmethodinfo_constructor.vb#1)]
